name: Idle Space Farmer
description:
Expand your space empire and give your farm a boost with specialized agents! Take this opportunity to conquer the universe with your farm!

FEATURES
• Upgrade your agents to increase your idle income
• Get idle cash even when you are offline!
• Lots of rewards waiting for you in your space empire!
• Every agent has a unique skill to boost productivity
• Prestige feature
• Gain profit from bounty missions
• Manage monster farms in multiple different worlds
• Farm different kinds of monsters without effort
• No Internet connection needed
• Over 35 unique agents for you to pick!

Having problems or suggestions?

Feel free to send an email to
otter@anxiousotter.com
– We are always happy to receive our players’ feedback!

Please like our Idle Space Farmer - Waifu Simulator Facebook page!
https://www.facebook.com/idlespacefarmer/
